mapper.select: SELECT user_id, username, email, user_sex, avatar, start_nation, start_city, dest_nation, dest_city, start_time, end_time, perf_vehicle, meg, user_regtime, FROM users WHERE user_id=#{userId};
select user_id, username, email, user_sex, avatar, start_nation, start_city, dest_nation, dest_city, start_time, end_time, perf_vehicle, meg, user_regtime FROM users ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4;

select user_id, username, email, user_sex, avatar, start_nation, start_city, dest_nation, dest_city, start_time, end_time, perf_vehicle, meg, user_regtime FROM users WHERE start_city = #{startCity} AND dest_city = #{destCity} AND start_time <= #{endTime} AND end_time >= #{startTime}

select user_id, username, email, user_sex, avatar, start_nation, start_city, dest_nation, dest_city, start_time, end_time, perf_vehicle, meg, user_regtime FROM users WHERE start_nation = #{startNation} AND dest_nation = #{destNation} AND start_time <= #{endTime} AND end_time >= #{startTime}
select user_id, username, email, user_sex, avatar, start_nation, start_city, dest_nation, dest_city, start_time, end_time, perf_vehicle, meg, user_regtime FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId}
select user_id, username, email, user_sex, avatar, start_nation, start_city, dest_nation, dest_city, start_time, end_time, perf_vehicle, meg, user_regtime FROM users WHERE username LIKE #{peopleName}
